credit_line: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
title: Semis Pilastre
description: Drapery swag border. The drapery suspends from acanthus ionic capitals. The swag supports a basket with floral bouquet and rod, from which hangs a foliate swag. Behind the drapery swag is a wide band of stylized floral motifs in rows, alternating with a narrow band of strung beads forming a pilaster. This border coordinates with sidewall 1998-75-67.
name: Sidewall
